trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryInterSiteTransport"></xref> class represents an inter-site transport object.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether all site links are bridged.
A <xref href="System.Boolean"></xref> value that indicates whether to bridge all site links.
`true` if all site links are bridged; otherwise, `false`.
A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
The target server is either busy or unavailable.
The current object has been disposed.
Releases all resources that are used by the object.
Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by the object and optionally releases the managed resources.
`true` if the managed resources should be released; `false` if only the unmanaged resources should be released.
Gets an <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryInterSiteTransport"></xref> object for a given directory context and transport type.
A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext"></xref> object that specifies the context for the search.
An <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryTransportType"></xref> object that specifies a transport type to find in the search.
An <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryInterSiteTransport"></xref> object for the item found.
An <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryObjectNotFoundException"></xref> exception is thrown if an object was not found.
The object was not found.
A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
The target server is either busy or unavailable.
The target in the context parameter is not a forest, configuration set, domain controller, or an AD LDS server.
The context parameter is `null`.
The credentials that were supplied are not valid.
The transport parameter is not a valid value.
Gets the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref> object for the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryInterSiteTransport"></xref> object.

A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"></xref> object that represents the directory entry for the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryInterSiteTransport"></xref> object.
The current object has been disposed.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the replication schedule is ignored.

When the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryInterSiteTransport.IgnoreReplicationSchedule%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is `true`, any site link availability schedules that have been configured are ignored, and all site links become always-available for replication.
When set to `false`, any previously configured site link availability schedules go back into effect.
If no site link availability schedules have been configured, setting this property has no effect.
A <xref href="System.Boolean"></xref> value that indicates whether to ignore the replication schedule.
`true` if the replication schedule is ignored; otherwise, `false`.
A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
The target server is either busy or unavailable.
The current object has been disposed.
Commits all changes to the current <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryInterSiteTransport"></xref> object to the underlying directory store.
A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
The target server is either busy or unavailable.
The current object has been disposed.
The specified account does not have permission to perform this operation.

Gets a <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlySiteLinkBridgeCollection"></xref> object that contains all site link bridges for this <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryInterSiteTransport"></xref> object.

A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlySiteLinkBridgeCollection"></xref> object that contains <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLinkBridge"></xref> objects that represent site link bridges.
A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
The target server is either busy or unavailable.
The current object has been disposed.

Gets a <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlySiteLinkCollection"></xref> object that contains all site links for this <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryInterSiteTransport"></xref> object.

A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlySiteLinkCollection"></xref> object that contains <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLink"></xref> objects that represent site links.
A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
The target server is either busy or unavailable.
The current object has been disposed.

Gets the string representation of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryTransportType"></xref> of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryInterSiteTransport"></xref> object.

A <xref href="System.String"></xref> that represents the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryTransportType"></xref> transport type of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryInterSiteTransport"></xref> object.
The current object has been disposed.

Gets an <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryTransportType"></xref> object that represents the transport type for this <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryInterSiteTransport"></xref> object.
One of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryTransportType"></xref> values that represents the transport type for this object.
The current object has been disposed.
